title: How to control ChatGPT with your voice
description: You can either make use of your platform's speech-to-text feature, or install third-party extensions to voice control ChatGPT

title: The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 drops to within $7 of its all-time low
description: The latest Microsoft tablet/laptop hybrid is $200 off in this Amazon deal.

title: Those Nothing Phone 2 renders might be totally wrong
description: It looks like a fundamental aspect of the renders could be incorrect, throwing the whole look into question.

title: Amazon’s Echo Show now lets you watch local weather reports in 15 cities
description: The feature is expected to expand to more cities in the future.

title: Headphone jacks and overnight-charging still preferred by many, says ASUS
description: Surprise surprise, there's still love for technologies passed-on by other big tech brands.

title: What does it mean to root a phone, and should you root your phone?
description: Rooting an Android phone gives you unbridled access to previously locked functions, but it comes with heavy risks.

title: Galaxy S24 codenames suggest Samsung hasn’t killed Plus model
description: If the Galaxy S24 Ultra is called "Muse3," this implies that "Muse1" and "Muse2" devices exist.

title: Apple Vision Pro’s Guest Mode will let you share the $3,500 headset with friends
description: All of the people around you can experience Apple's vision of mixed reality.

title: The OPPO Find N3 Flip could be the best clamshell foldable for cameras
description: The Find N2 Flip offered a dual rear camera system, but OPPO could up the ante with the Find N3 Flip.

title: Poll: Do you think your phone is listening to you for ad purposes?
description: Do you think it's just a coincidence or is there something more nefarious happening?

title: Now the UK is warning Android users over accidental emergency calls
description: Maybe Android OEMs shouldn't enable this critical feature by default?
